person.persName: James P. Hart (Caldwell County, KY, farmer )

body.p: Christian County and Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Sarah "Sallie" A. Hester Hart in Trigg County, Kentucky, on May 5, 1853. Father of Lucy E. Hart, Charles H. Hart, James R. Hart, Virginia A. Hart, and Willie P. Hart. Farmer in Christian County in 1850. Farmer in Burnesville in 1860.
